app.modules.foliage.controller 

   1# Python standard library imports
   2import json
   3
   4# Third party imports
   5from flask_jwt_extended import jwt_required, get_jwt
   6from flask import request, jsonify, Response
   7from flask.views import MethodView
   8from werkzeug.exceptions import BadRequest, NotFound, Forbidden, Unauthorized
   9from sqlalchemy.orm import joinedload
  10
  11# Local application imports
  12from app.extensions import db
  13from app.core.controller import check_permission
  14from app.core.models import RoleEnum, ResellerPackage
  15from .models import Farm, Lot, Crop, LotCrop, CommonAnalysis, NutrientApplication, Nutrient, LeafAnalysis, Objective, objective_nutrients

  18# Vista para granjas (farms)
  19
  20class FarmView(MethodView):
  21    """Clase para gestionar operaciones CRUD sobre granjas."""
  22    decorators = [jwt_required()]
  23    
  24    @check_permission(required_roles=["administrator", "reseller"])
  25    def get(self, farm_id=None):
  26        """
  27        Obtiene una lista de granjas o una granja específica.
  28        Args:
  29            farm_id (str, optional): ID de la granja a consultar.
  30        Returns:
  31            JSON: Lista de granjas o detalles de una granja específica.
  32        """
  33        if farm_id:
  34            return self._get_farm(farm_id)
  35        return self._get_farm_list()
  36    
  37    @check_permission(required_roles=["administrator", "reseller"])
  38    def post(self):
  39        """
  40        Crea una nueva granja.
  41        Returns:
  42            JSON: Detalles de la granja creada.
  43        """
  44        data = request.get_json()
  45        if not data or not all(k in data for k in ("name", "org_id")):
  46            raise BadRequest("Missing required fields.")
  47        return self._create_farm(data)
  48    
  49    @check_permission(resource_owner_check=True)
  50    def put(self, id: int):
  51        """
  52        Actualiza una granja existente.
  53        Args:
  54            farm_id (str): ID de la granja a actualizar.
  55        Returns:
  56            JSON: Detalles de la granja actualizada.
  57        """
  58        data = request.get_json()
  59        farm_id = data.get("id")
  60        if not data or not farm_id:
  61            raise BadRequest("Missing farm_id or data.")
  62        return self._update_farm(farm_id, data)
  63    
  64    @check_permission(resource_owner_check=True)
  65    def delete(self, farm_id=None):
  66        """
  67        Elimina una granja existente.
  68        Args:
  69            farm_id (str): ID de la granja a eliminar.
  70        Returns:
  71            JSON: Mensaje de confirmación.
  72        """
  73        data = request.get_json()
  74        if data and "ids" in data:
  75            return self._delete_farm(farm_ids=data["ids"])
  76        if farm_id:
  77            return self._delete_farm(farm_id=farm_id)
  78        raise BadRequest("Missing farm_id.")
  79    
  80    # Métodos auxiliares
  81    def _get_farm_list(self):
  82        """Obtiene una lista de todas las granjas activas."""
  83        claims = get_jwt()
  84        user_role = claims.get("rol")
  85        org_id = claims.get("org_id")
  86        if user_role == RoleEnum.ADMINISTRATOR.value:
  87            if hasattr(Farm, 'active'):
  88                farms = Farm.query.filter_by(active=True).all()
  89            else:
  90                farms = Farm.query.all()
  91        elif user_role == RoleEnum.RESELLER.value:
  92            reseller_package = ResellerPackage.query.filter_by(
  93                reseller_id=org_id
  94            ).first()
  95            if not reseller_package:
  96                raise NotFound("Reseller package not found.")
  97            farms = []
  98            for org in reseller_package.organizations:
  99                farms.extend(org.farms)
 100        else:
 101            raise Forbidden("Only administrators and resellers can list farms.")
 102        response_data = [self._serialize_farm(farm) for farm in farms]
 103        json_data = json.dumps(response_data, ensure_ascii=False, indent=4)
 104        return Response(json_data, status=200, mimetype="application/json")
 105    
 106    def _get_farm(self, farm_id):
 107        """Obtiene los detalles de una granja específica."""
 108        farm = Farm.query.get_or_404(farm_id)
 109        claims = get_jwt()
 110        if not self._has_access(farm, claims):
 111            raise Forbidden("You do not have access to this farm.")
 112        response_data = self._serialize_farm(farm)
 113        json_data = json.dumps(response_data, ensure_ascii=False, indent=4)
 114        return Response(json_data, status=200, mimetype="application/json")
 115    
 116    def _create_farm(self, data):
 117        """Crea una nueva granja con los datos proporcionados."""
 118        if hasattr(Farm, 'active'):
 119            if Farm.query.filter_by(name=data["name"], org_id=data["org_id"], active=True).first():
 120                raise BadRequest("Name already exists.")
 121        else:
 122            if Farm.query.filter_by(name=data["name"], org_id=data["org_id"]).first():
 123                raise BadRequest("Name already exists.")
 124        farm = Farm(
 125            name=data["name"],
 126            org_id=data["org_id"],
 127        )
 128        db.session.add(farm)
 129        db.session.commit()
 130        response_data = self._serialize_farm(farm)
 131        json_data = json.dumps(response_data, ensure_ascii=False, indent=4)
 132        return Response(json_data, status=201, mimetype="application/json")
 133    
 134    def _update_farm(self, farm_id, data):
 135        """Actualiza los datos de una granja existente."""
 136        farm = Farm.query.get_or_404(farm_id)
 137        if "name" in data and data["name"] != farm.name:
 138            if hasattr(Farm, 'active'):
 139                if Farm.query.filter_by(name=data["name"], org_id=farm.org_id, active=True).first():
 140                    raise BadRequest("Name already exists.")
 141            else:
 142                if Farm.query.filter_by(name=data["name"], org_id=farm.org_id).first():
 143                    raise BadRequest("Name already exists.")
 144            farm.name = data["name"]
 145        if "org_id" in data:
 146            farm.org_id = data["org_id"]
 147        db.session.commit()
 148        response_data = self._serialize_farm(farm)
 149        json_data = json.dumps(response_data, ensure_ascii=False, indent=4)
 150        return Response(json_data, status=200, mimetype="application/json")
 151    
 152    def _delete_farm(self, farm_id=None, farm_ids=None):
 153        """Elimina una granja marcándola como inactiva."""
 154        claims = get_jwt()
 155        if farm_id and farm_ids:
 156            raise BadRequest("Solo se puede especificar farm_id o farm_ids, no ambos.")
 157        if farm_id:
 158            farm = Farm.query.get_or_404(farm_id)
 159            if hasattr(farm, 'active'):
 160                farm.active = False
 161            else:
 162                db.session.delete(farm)
 163            db.session.commit()
 164            return jsonify({"message": "Farm deleted successfully"}), 200
 165        if farm_ids:
 166            deleted_farms = []
 167            for farm_id in farm_ids:
 168                farm = Farm.query.get(farm_id)
 169                if not farm:
 170                    continue
 171                if hasattr(farm, 'active'):
 172                    farm.active = False
 173                else:
 174                    db.session.delete(farm)
 175                deleted_farms.append(farm.name)
 176                db.session.commit()
 177            deleted_farms_str = ", ".join(deleted_farms)
 178            return jsonify({"message": f"Farms {deleted_farms_str} deleted successfully"}), 200
 179        if not deleted_farms:
 180            return jsonify({"error": "No farms were deleted due to permission restrictions"}), 403
 181    
 182    def _has_access(self, farm, claims):
 183        """Verifica si el usuario actual tiene acceso al recurso."""
 184        user_role = claims.get("rol")
 185        org_id = claims.get("org_id")
 186        if user_role == RoleEnum.ADMINISTRATOR.value:
 187            return True
 188        if user_role == RoleEnum.RESELLER.value:
 189            reseller_package = ResellerPackage.query.filter_by(
 190                reseller_id=org_id
 191            ).first()
 192            return any(
 193                org.id in [o.id for o in reseller_package.organizations]
 194                for org in farm.organization
 195            )
 196        return farm.org_id == claims.get("org_id")
 197    
 198    def _serialize_farm(self, farm):
 199        """Serializa un objeto Farm a un diccionario."""
 200        return {
 201            "id": farm.id,
 202            "name": farm.name,
 203            "org_id": farm.org_id,
 204            "org_name": farm.organization.name if farm.organization else "",
 205            "lots": [lot.name for lot in farm.lots],
 206            "created_at": farm.created_at.isoformat(),
 207            "updated_at": farm.updated_at.isoformat(),
 208        }

 210# Vista para lotes (lots)

 212class LotView(MethodView):
 213    """Clase para gestionar operaciones CRUD sobre lotes."""
 214    decorators = [jwt_required()]
 215    
 216    @check_permission(required_roles=["administrator", "reseller"])
 217    def get(self, lot_id=None):
 218        """
 219        Obtiene una lista de lotes o un lote específico.
 220        Args:
 221            lot_id (str, optional): ID del lote a consultar.
 222        Returns:
 223            JSON: Lista de lotes o detalles de un lote específico.
 224        """
 225        if lot_id:
 226            return self._get_lot(lot_id)
 227        return self._get_lot_list()
 228    
 229    @check_permission(required_roles=["administrator", "reseller"])
 230    def post(self):
 231        """
 232        Crea un nuevo lote.
 233        Returns:
 234            JSON: Detalles del lote creado.
 235        """
 236        data = request.get_json()
 237        if not data or not all(k in data for k in ("name", "area", "farm_id")):
 238            raise BadRequest("Missing required fields.")
 239        return self._create_lot(data)
 240    
 241    @check_permission(resource_owner_check=True)
 242    def put(self, id=None):
 243        """
 244        Actualiza un lote existente.
 245        Args:
 246            lot_id (str): ID del lote a actualizar.
 247        Returns:
 248            JSON: Detalles del lote actualizado.
 249        """
 250        data = request.get_json()
 251        lot_id = data.get("id")
 252        if not data or not lot_id:
 253            raise BadRequest("Missing lot_id or data.")
 254        return self._update_lot(lot_id, data)
 255    
 256    @check_permission(resource_owner_check=True)
 257    def delete(self, id=None):
 258        """
 259        Elimina un lote existente.
 260        Args:
 261            lot_id (str): ID del lote a eliminar.
 262        Returns:
 263            JSON: Mensaje de confirmación.
 264        """
 265        data = request.get_json()
 266        if data and "ids" in data:
 267            return self._delete_lot(lot_ids=data["ids"])
 268        if id:
 269            return self._delete_lot(lot_id=id)
 270
 271        raise BadRequest("Missing lot_id.")
 272    
 273    # Métodos auxiliares
 274    def _get_lot_list(self, filter_by=None):
 275        """Obtiene una lista de lotes activos según el rol del usuario."""
 276        claims = get_jwt()
 277        user_role = claims.get("rol")
 278        user_id = claims.get("id")
 279        lots = []  # Lista de lotes que se devolverá
 280        if user_role == RoleEnum.ADMINISTRATOR.value:
 281            query = Lot.query
 282            if hasattr(Lot, 'active'):
 283                query = query.filter_by(active=True)
 284            if filter_by:
 285                query = query.filter_by(farm_id=filter_by)
 286            lots = query.all()
 287        elif user_role == RoleEnum.RESELLER.value:
 288            reseller_package = ResellerPackage.query.options(
 289                joinedload(ResellerPackage.organizations).joinedload("lots")
 290            ).filter_by(reseller_id=user_id).first()
 291            if not reseller_package:
 292                raise NotFound("Reseller package not found.")
 293            # Usamos un conjunto para evitar duplicados
 294            lots = {lot for org in reseller_package.organizations for lot in org.lots}
 295            # Convertimos a lista para la serialización final
 296            lots = list(lots)
 297        else:
 298            raise Forbidden("Only administrators and resellers can list lots.")
 299        # Serialización y respuesta
 300        response_data = [self._serialize_lot(lot) for lot in lots]
 301        json_data = json.dumps(response_data, ensure_ascii=False, indent=4)
 302        return Response(json_data, status=200, mimetype="application/json")
 303    
 304    def _get_lot(self, lot_id):
 305        """Obtiene los detalles de un lote específico."""
 306        lot = Lot.query.get_or_404(lot_id)
 307        claims = get_jwt()
 308        if not self._has_access(lot, claims):
 309            raise Forbidden("You do not have access to this lot.")
 310        response_data = self._serialize_lot(lot)
 311        json_data = json.dumps(response_data, ensure_ascii=False, indent=4)
 312        return Response(json_data, status=200, mimetype="application/json")
 313    
 314    def _create_lot(self, data):
 315        """Crea un nuevo lote con los datos proporcionados."""
 316        if hasattr(Lot, 'active'):
 317            if Lot.query.filter_by(name=data["name"], active=True).first():
 318                raise BadRequest("Name already exists.")
 319        else:
 320            if Lot.query.filter_by(name=data["name"]).first():
 321                raise BadRequest("Name already exists.")
 322        lot = Lot(
 323            name=data["name"],
 324            area=data["area"],
 325            farm_id=data["farm_id"],
 326        )
 327        db.session.add(lot)
 328        db.session.commit()
 329        response_data = self._serialize_lot(lot)
 330        json_data = json.dumps(response_data, ensure_ascii=False, indent=4)
 331        return Response(json_data, status=201, mimetype="application/json")
 332    
 333    def _update_lot(self, lot_id, data):
 334        """Actualiza los datos de un lote existente."""
 335        lot = Lot.query.get_or_404(lot_id)
 336        if "name" in data and data["name"] != lot.name:
 337            if hasattr(Lot, 'active'):
 338                if Lot.query.filter_by(name=data["name"], active=True).first():
 339                    raise BadRequest("Name already exists.")
 340            else:
 341                if Lot.query.filter_by(name=data["name"]).first():
 342                    raise BadRequest("Name already exists.")
 343            lot.name = data["name"]
 344        if "area" in data:
 345            lot.area = data["area"]
 346        if "farm_id" in data:
 347            lot.farm_id = data["farm_id"]
 348        db.session.commit()
 349        response_data = self._serialize_lot(lot)
 350        json_data = json.dumps(response_data, ensure_ascii=False, indent=4)
 351        return Response(json_data, status=200, mimetype="application/json")
 352    
 353    def _delete_lot(self, lot_id=None, lot_ids=None):
 354        """Elimina un lote marcándolo como inactivo."""
 355        claims = get_jwt()
 356        if lot_id and lot_ids:
 357            raise BadRequest("Solo se puede especificar lot_id o lot_ids, no ambos.")
 358        if lot_id:
 359            lot = Lot.query.get_or_404(lot_id)
 360            if hasattr(lot, 'active'):
 361                lot.active = False
 362            else:
 363                db.session.delete(lot)
 364            db.session.commit()
 365            return jsonify({"message": "Lot deleted successfully"}), 200
 366        if lot_ids:
 367            deleted_lots = []
 368            for lot_id in lot_ids:
 369                lot = Lot.query.get(lot_id)
 370                if not lot:
 371                    continue
 372                if hasattr(lot, 'active'):
 373                    lot.active = False
 374                else:
 375                    db.session.delete(lot)
 376                deleted_lots.append(lot.name)
 377                db.session.commit()
 378                deleted_lots_str = ", ".join(deleted_lots)
 379            return jsonify({"message": f"Lots {deleted_lots_str} deleted successfully"}), 200
 380        if not deleted_lots:
 381            return jsonify({"error": "No lots were deleted due to permission restrictions"}), 403
 382    
 383    def _has_access(self, lot, claims):
 384        """Verifica si el usuario actual tiene acceso al recurso."""
 385        user_role = claims.get("rol")
 386        user_id = claims.get("id")
 387        if user_role == RoleEnum.ADMINISTRATOR.value:
 388            return True
 389        if user_role == RoleEnum.RESELLER.value:
 390            reseller_package = ResellerPackage.query.filter_by(
 391                reseller_id=user_id
 392            ).first()
 393            return any(
 394                org.id in [o.id for o in reseller_package.organizations]
 395                for org in lot.farm.user.organizations
 396            )
 397        return user_id == lot.farm.user_id
 398    
 399    def _serialize_lot(self, lot):
 400        """Serializa un objeto Lot a un diccionario."""
 401        return {
 402            "id": lot.id,
 403            "name": lot.name,
 404            "area": lot.area,
 405            "farm_id": lot.farm_id,
 406            "farm_name": lot.farm.name if lot.farm else "",
 407            "created_at": lot.created_at.isoformat(),
 408            "updated_at": lot.updated_at.isoformat(),
 409        }

 412# Vista para cultivos (crops)

 414class CropView(MethodView):
 415    """Clase para gestionar operaciones CRUD sobre cultivos."""
 416    decorators = [jwt_required()]
 417    
 418    @check_permission(required_roles=["administrator", "reseller"])
 419    def get(self, crop_id=None):
 420        """
 421        Obtiene una lista de cultivos o un cultivo específico.
 422        Args:
 423            crop_id (str, optional): ID del cultivo a consultar.
 424        Returns:
 425            JSON: Lista de cultivos o detalles de un cultivo específico.
 426        """
 427        if crop_id:
 428            return self._get_crop(crop_id)
 429        return self._get_crop_list()
 430    
 431    @check_permission(required_roles=["administrator", "reseller"])
 432    def post(self):
 433        """
 434        Crea un nuevo cultivo.
 435        Returns:
 436            JSON: Detalles del cultivo creado.
 437        """
 438        data = request.get_json()
 439        if not data or not all(k in data for k in ("name",)):
 440            raise BadRequest("Missing required fields.")
 441        return self._create_crop(data)
 442    
 443    @check_permission(resource_owner_check=True)
 444    def put(self, id):
 445        """
 446        Actualiza un cultivo existente.
 447        Args:
 448            crop_id (str): ID del cultivo a actualizar.
 449        Returns:
 450            JSON: Detalles del cultivo actualizado.
 451        """
 452        data = request.get_json()
 453        crop_id = data.get("id")
 454        if not data or not crop_id:
 455            raise BadRequest("Missing crop_id or data.")
 456        return self._update_crop(crop_id, data)
 457    
 458    @check_permission(resource_owner_check=True)
 459    def delete(self, id=None):
 460        """
 461        Elimina un cultivo existente.
 462        Args:
 463            crop_id (str): ID del cultivo a eliminar.
 464        Returns:
 465            JSON: Mensaje de confirmación.
 466        """
 467        data = request.get_json()
 468        if data and "ids" in data:
 469            return self._delete_crop(crop_ids=data["ids"])
 470        crop_id = id
 471        if crop_id:
 472            return self._delete_crop(crop_id=crop_id)
 473        raise BadRequest("Missing crop_id.")
 474    
 475    # Métodos auxiliares
 476    def _get_crop_list(self):
 477        """Obtiene una lista de todos los cultivos activos."""
 478        claims = get_jwt()
 479        user_role = claims.get("rol")
 480        user_id = claims.get("id")
 481        if user_role == RoleEnum.ADMINISTRATOR.value:
 482            if hasattr(Crop, 'active'):
 483                crops = Crop.query.filter_by(active=True).all()
 484            else:
 485                crops = Crop.query.all()
 486        elif user_role == RoleEnum.RESELLER.value:
 487            reseller_package = ResellerPackage.query.filter_by(
 488                reseller_id=user_id
 489            ).first()
 490            if not reseller_package:
 491                raise NotFound("Reseller package not found.")
 492            crops = []
 493            for org in reseller_package.organizations:
 494                crops.extend(org.crops)
 495        else:
 496            raise Forbidden("Only administrators and resellers can list crops.")
 497        response_data = [self._serialize_crop(crop) for crop in crops]
 498        json_data = json.dumps(response_data, ensure_ascii=False, indent=4)
 499        return Response(json_data, status=200, mimetype="application/json")
 500    
 501    def _get_crop(self, crop_id):
 502        """Obtiene los detalles de un cultivo específico."""
 503        crop = Crop.query.get_or_404(crop_id)
 504        claims = get_jwt()
 505        if not self._has_access(crop, claims):
 506            raise Forbidden("You do not have access to this crop.")
 507        response_data = self._serialize_crop(crop)
 508        json_data = json.dumps(response_data, ensure_ascii=False, indent=4)
 509        return Response(json_data, status=200, mimetype="application/json")
 510    
 511    def _create_crop(self, data):
 512        """Crea un nuevo cultivo con los datos proporcionados."""
 513        if hasattr(Crop, 'active'):
 514            if Crop.query.filter_by(name=data["name"], active=True).first():
 515                raise BadRequest("Name already exists.")
 516        else:
 517            if Crop.query.filter_by(name=data["name"]).first():
 518                raise BadRequest("Name already exists.")
 519        crop = Crop(
 520            name=data["name"],
 521        )
 522        db.session.add(crop)
 523        db.session.commit()
 524        response_data = self._serialize_crop(crop)
 525        json_data = json.dumps(response_data, ensure_ascii=False, indent=4)
 526        return Response(json_data, status=201, mimetype="application/json")
 527    
 528    def _update_crop(self, crop_id, data):
 529        """Actualiza los datos de un cultivo existente."""
 530        crop = Crop.query.get_or_404(crop_id)
 531        if "name" in data and data["name"] != crop.name:
 532            if hasattr(Crop, 'active'):
 533                if Crop.query.filter_by(name=data["name"], active=True).first():
 534                    raise BadRequest("Name already exists.")
 535            else:
 536                if Crop.query.filter_by(name=data["name"]).first():
 537                    raise BadRequest("Name already exists.")
 538            crop.name = data["name"]
 539        db.session.commit()
 540        response_data = self._serialize_crop(crop)
 541        json_data = json.dumps(response_data, ensure_ascii=False, indent=4)
 542        return Response(json_data, status=200, mimetype="application/json")
 543    
 544    def _delete_crop(self, crop_id=None, crop_ids=None):
 545        """Elimina un cultivo marcándolo como inactivo."""
 546        claims = get_jwt()
 547        if crop_id and crop_ids:
 548            raise BadRequest("Solo se puede especificar crop_id o crop_ids, no ambos.")
 549        if crop_id:
 550            crop = Crop.query.get_or_404(crop_id)
 551            if hasattr(crop, 'active'):
 552                crop.active = False
 553            else:
 554                db.session.delete(crop)
 555            db.session.commit()
 556            return jsonify({"message": "Crop deleted successfully"}), 200
 557        if crop_ids:
 558            deleted_crops = []
 559            for crop_id in crop_ids:
 560                crop = Crop.query.get(crop_id)
 561                if not crop:
 562                    continue
 563                if hasattr(crop, 'active'):
 564                    crop.active = False
 565                else:
 566                    db.session.delete(crop)
 567                deleted_crops.append(crop.name)
 568                db.session.commit()
 569                deleted_crops_str = ", ".join(deleted_crops)
 570            return jsonify({"message": f"Crops {deleted_crops_str} deleted successfully"}), 200
 571        if not deleted_crops:
 572            return jsonify({"error": "No crops were deleted due to permission restrictions"}), 403
 573    
 574    def _has_access(self, crop, claims):
 575        """Verifica si el usuario actual tiene acceso al recurso."""
 576        user_role = claims.get("rol")
 577        user_id = claims.get("id")
 578        if user_role == RoleEnum.ADMINISTRATOR.value:
 579            return True
 580        if user_role == RoleEnum.RESELLER.value:
 581            reseller_package = ResellerPackage.query.filter_by(
 582                reseller_id=user_id
 583            ).first()
 584            return any(
 585                org.id in [o.id for o in reseller_package.organizations]
 586                for org in crop.user.organizations
 587            )
 588        return user_id == crop.user_id
 589    
 590    def _serialize_crop(self, crop):
 591        """Serializa un objeto Crop a un diccionario."""
 592        return {
 593            "id": crop.id,
 594            "name": crop.name,
 595            "created_at": crop.created_at.isoformat(),
 596            "updated_at": crop.updated_at.isoformat(),
 597        }
 598
 599# Vista para lotes de cultivos (lot_crops)
 600class LotCropView(MethodView):
 601    """Clase para gestionar operaciones CRUD sobre lotes de cultivos."""
 602    decorators = [jwt_required()]
 603    
 604    @check_permission(required_roles=["administrator", "reseller"])
 605    def get(self, lot_crop_id=None):
 606        """
 607        Obtiene una lista de lotes de cultivos o un lote de cultivo específico.
 608        Args:
 609            lot_crop_id (str, optional): ID del lote de cultivo a consultar.
 610        Returns:
 611            JSON: Lista de lotes de cultivos o detalles de un lote de cultivo específico.
 612        """
 613        if lot_crop_id:
 614            return self._get_lot_crop(lot_crop_id)
 615        return self._get_lot_crop_list()
 616    
 617    @check_permission(required_roles=["administrator", "reseller"])
 618    def post(self):
 619        """
 620        Crea un nuevo lote de cultivo.
 621        Returns:
 622            JSON: Detalles del lote de cultivo creado.
 623        """
 624        data = request.get_json()
 625        if not data or not all(k in data for k in ("lot_id", "crop_id", "start_date")):
 626            raise BadRequest("Missing required fields.")
 627        return self._create_lot_crop(data)
 628    
 629    @check_permission(resource_owner_check=True)
 630    def put(self, lot_crop_id):
 631        """
 632        Actualiza un lote de cultivo existente.
 633        Args:
 634            lot_crop_id (str): ID del lote de cultivo a actualizar.
 635        Returns:
 636            JSON: Detalles del lote de cultivo actualizado.
 637        """
 638        data = request.get_json()
 639        if not data or not lot_crop_id:
 640            raise BadRequest("Missing lot_crop_id or data.")
 641        return self._update_lot_crop(lot_crop_id, data)
 642    
 643    @check_permission(resource_owner_check=True)
 644    def delete(self, lot_crop_id=None):
 645        """
 646        Elimina un lote de cultivo existente.
 647        Args:
 648            lot_crop_id (str): ID del lote de cultivo a eliminar.
 649        Returns:
 650            JSON: Mensaje de confirmación.
 651        """
 652        data = request.get_json()
 653        if data and "ids" in data:
 654            return self._delete_lot_crop(lot_crop_ids=data["ids"])
 655        if lot_crop_id:
 656            return self._delete_lot_crop(lot_crop_id=lot_crop_id)
 657        raise BadRequest("Missing lot_crop_id.")
 658    
 659    # Métodos auxiliares
 660    def _get_lot_crop_list(self):
 661        """Obtiene una lista de todos los lotes de cultivos activos."""
 662        claims = get_jwt()
 663        user_role = claims.get("rol")
 664        user_id = claims.get("id")
 665        if user_role == RoleEnum.ADMINISTRATOR.value:
 666            if hasattr(LotCrop, 'active'):
 667                lot_crops = LotCrop.query.filter_by(active=True).all()
 668            else:
 669                lot_crops = LotCrop.query.all()
 670        elif user_role == RoleEnum.RESELLER.value:
 671            reseller_package = ResellerPackage.query.filter_by(
 672                reseller_id=user_id
 673            ).first()
 674            if not reseller_package:
 675                raise NotFound("Reseller package not found.")
 676            lot_crops = []
 677            for org in reseller_package.organizations:
 678                lot_crops.extend(org.lot_crops)
 679        else:
 680            raise Forbidden("Only administrators and resellers can list lot_crops.")
 681        response_data = [self._serialize_lot_crop(lot_crop) for lot_crop in lot_crops]
 682        json_data = json.dumps(response_data, ensure_ascii=False, indent=4)
 683        return Response(json_data, status=200, mimetype="application/json")
 684    
 685    def _get_lot_crop(self, lot_crop_id):
 686        """Obtiene los detalles de un lote de cultivo específico."""
 687        lot_crop = LotCrop.query.get_or_404(lot_crop_id)
 688        claims = get_jwt()
 689        if not self._has_access(lot_crop, claims):
 690            raise Forbidden("You do not have access to this lot_crop.")
 691        response_data = self._serialize_lot_crop(lot_crop)
 692        json_data = json.dumps(response_data, ensure_ascii=False, indent=4)
 693        return Response(json_data, status=200, mimetype="application/json")
 694    
 695    def _create_lot_crop(self, data):
 696        """Crea un nuevo lote de cultivo con los datos proporcionados."""
 697        if hasattr(LotCrop, 'active'):
 698            if LotCrop.query.filter_by(lot_id=data["lot_id"], crop_id=data["crop_id"], active=True).first():
 699                raise BadRequest("LotCrop already exists.")
 700        else:
 701            if LotCrop.query.filter_by(lot_id=data["lot_id"], crop_id=data["crop_id"]).first():
 702                raise BadRequest("LotCrop already exists.")
 703        lot_crop = LotCrop(
 704            lot_id=data["lot_id"],
 705            crop_id=data["crop_id"],
 706            start_date=data["start_date"],
 707        )
 708        db.session.add(lot_crop)
 709        db.session.commit()
 710        response_data = self._serialize_lot_crop(lot_crop)
 711        json_data = json.dumps(response_data, ensure_ascii=False, indent=4)
 712        return Response(json_data, status=201, mimetype="application/json")
 713    
 714    def _update_lot_crop(self, lot_crop_id, data):
 715        """Actualiza los datos de un lote de cultivo existente."""
 716        lot_crop = LotCrop.query.get_or_404(lot_crop_id)
 717        if "lot_id" in data and data["lot_id"] != lot_crop.lot_id:
 718            if hasattr(LotCrop, 'active'):
 719                if LotCrop.query.filter_by(lot_id=data["lot_id"], crop_id=lot_crop.crop_id, active=True).first():
 720                    raise BadRequest("LotCrop already exists.")
 721            else:
 722                if LotCrop.query.filter_by(lot_id=data["lot_id"], crop_id=lot_crop.crop_id).first():
 723                    raise BadRequest("LotCrop already exists.")
 724            lot_crop.lot_id = data["lot_id"]
 725        if "crop_id" in data:
 726            lot_crop.crop_id = data["crop_id"]
 727        if "start_date" in data:
 728            lot_crop.start_date = data["start_date"]
 729        db.session.commit()
 730        response_data = self._serialize_lot_crop(lot_crop)
 731        json_data = json.dumps(response_data, ensure_ascii=False, indent=4)
 732        return Response(json_data, status=200, mimetype="application/json")
 733    
 734    def _delete_lot_crop(self, lot_crop_id=None, lot_crop_ids=None):
 735        """Elimina un lote de cultivo marcándolo como inactivo."""
 736        claims = get_jwt()
 737        if lot_crop_id and lot_crop_ids:
 738            raise BadRequest("Solo se puede especificar lot_crop_id o lot_crop_ids, no ambos.")
 739        if lot_crop_id:
 740            lot_crop = LotCrop.query.get_or_404(lot_crop_id)
 741            if hasattr(lot_crop, 'active'):
 742                lot_crop.active = False
 743            else:
 744                db.session.delete(lot_crop)
 745            db.session.commit()
 746            return jsonify({"message": "LotCrop deleted successfully"}), 200
 747        if lot_crop_ids:
 748            deleted_lot_crops = []
 749            for lot_crop_id in lot_crop_ids:
 750                lot_crop = LotCrop.query.get(lot_crop_id)
 751                if not lot_crop:
 752                    continue
 753                if hasattr(lot_crop, 'active'):
 754                    lot_crop.active = False
 755                else:
 756                    db.session.delete(lot_crop)
 757                deleted_lot_crops.append(lot_crop.lot_id)
 758                db.session.commit()
 759                deleted_lot_crops_str = ", ".join(map(str, deleted_lot_crops))
 760            return jsonify({"message": f"LotCrops {deleted_lot_crops_str} deleted successfully"}), 200
 761        if not deleted_lot_crops:
 762            return jsonify({"error": "No lot_crops were deleted due to permission restrictions"}), 403
 763    
 764    def _has_access(self, lot_crop, claims):
 765        """Verifica si el usuario actual tiene acceso al recurso."""
 766        user_role = claims.get("rol")
 767        user_id = claims.get("id")
 768        if user_role == RoleEnum.ADMINISTRATOR.value:
 769            return True
 770        if user_role == RoleEnum.RESELLER.value:
 771            reseller_package = ResellerPackage.query.filter_by(
 772                reseller_id=user_id
 773            ).first()
 774            return any(
 775                org.id in [o.id for o in reseller_package.organizations]
 776                for org in lot_crop.lot.farm.user.organizations
 777            )
 778        return user_id == lot_crop.lot.farm.user_id
 779    
 780    def _serialize_lot_crop(self, lot_crop):
 781        """Serializa un objeto LotCrop a un diccionario."""
 782        return {
 783            "id": lot_crop.id,
 784            "lot_id": lot_crop.lot_id,
 785            "crop_id": lot_crop.crop_id,
 786            "start_date": lot_crop.start_date,
 787            "created_at": lot_crop.created_at.isoformat(),
 788            "updated_at": lot_crop.updated_at.isoformat(),
 789        }
 790

 975# Vista para nutrientes (nutrients)
 976class NutrientView(MethodView):
 977    """Clase para gestionar operaciones CRUD sobre nutrientes."""
 978    decorators = [jwt_required()]
 979    
 980    @check_permission(required_roles=["administrator", "reseller"])
 981    def get(self, nutrient_id=None):
 982        """
 983        Obtiene una lista de nutrientes o un nutriente específico.
 984        Args:
 985            nutrient_id (str, optional): ID del nutriente a consultar.
 986        Returns:
 987            JSON: Lista de nutrientes o detalles de un nutriente específico.
 988        """
 989        if nutrient_id:
 990            return self._get_nutrient(nutrient_id)
 991        return self._get_nutrient_list()
 992    
 993    @check_permission(required_roles=["administrator", "reseller"])
 994    def post(self):
 995        """
 996        Crea un nuevo nutriente.
 997        Returns:
 998            JSON: Detalles del nutriente creado.
 999        """
1000        data = request.get_json()
1001        if not data or not all(k in data for k in ("name", "symbol", "unit")):
1002            raise BadRequest("Missing required fields.")
1003        return self._create_nutrient(data)
1004

1006    def put(self, id: int):
1007        """
1008        Actualiza un nutriente existente.
1009        Args:
1010            nutrient_id (str): ID del nutriente a actualizar.
1011        Returns:
1012            JSON: Detalles del nutriente actualizado.
1013        """

1015        nutrient_id = id
1016        if not data or not nutrient_id:
1017            raise BadRequest("Missing nutrient_id or data.")
1018        return self._update_nutrient(nutrient_id, data)

1021    def delete(self, id=None):
1022        """
1023        Elimina un nutriente existente.
1024        Args:
1025            nutrient_id (str): ID del nutriente a eliminar.
1026        Returns:
1027            JSON: Mensaje de confirmación.
1028        """
1029        data = request.get_json()
1030        nutrient_id = id
1031        if data and "ids" in data:
1032            return self._delete_nutrient(nutrient_ids=data["ids"])
1033        if nutrient_id:
1034            return self._delete_nutrient(nutrient_id=nutrient_id)
1035        raise BadRequest("Missing nutrient_id.")
1036

1038    def _get_nutrient_list(self):

1041        user_role = claims.get("rol")
1042        user_id = claims.get("id")
1043        if user_role == RoleEnum.ADMINISTRATOR.value:
1044            if hasattr(Nutrient, 'active'):
1045                nutrients = Nutrient.query.filter_by(active=True).all()
1046            else:
1047                nutrients = Nutrient.query.all()
1048        elif user_role == RoleEnum.RESELLER.value:
1049            reseller_package = ResellerPackage.query.filter_by(
1050                reseller_id=user_id
1051            ).first()
1052            if not reseller_package:
1053                raise NotFound("Reseller package not found.")
1054            nutrients = []
1055            for org in reseller_package.organizations:
1056                nutrients.extend(org.nutrients)
1057        else:
1058            raise Forbidden("Only administrators and resellers can list nutrients.")
1059        response_data = [self._serialize_nutrient(nutrient) for nutrient in nutrients]
1060        json_data = json.dumps(response_data, ensure_ascii=False, indent=4)
1061        return Response(json_data, status=200, mimetype="application/json")
1062    
1063    def _get_nutrient(self, nutrient_id):
1064        """Obtiene los detalles de un nutriente específico."""

1067        if not self._has_access(nutrient, claims):
1068            raise Forbidden("You do not have access to this nutrient.")
1069        response_data = self._serialize_nutrient(nutrient)

1071        return Response(json_data, status=200, mimetype="application/json")
1072    
1073    def _create_nutrient(self, data):
1074        """Crea un nuevo nutriente con los datos proporcionados."""
1075        if hasattr(Nutrient, 'active'):
1076            if Nutrient.query.filter_by(name=data["name"], active=True).first():
1077                raise BadRequest("Name already exists.")
1078        else:
1079            if Nutrient.query.filter_by(name=data["name"]).first():
1080                raise BadRequest("Name already exists.")
1081        nutrient = Nutrient(
1082            name=data["name"],
1083            symbol=data["symbol"],
1084            unit=data["unit"],
1085        )
1086        db.session.add(nutrient)
1087        db.session.commit()
1088        response_data = self._serialize_nutrient(nutrient)
1089        json_data = json.dumps(response_data, ensure_ascii=False, indent=4)
1090        return Response(json_data, status=201, mimetype="application/json")
1091    
1092    def _update_nutrient(self, nutrient_id, data):
1093        """Actualiza los datos de un nutriente existente."""
1094        nutrient = Nutrient.query.get_or_404(nutrient_id)
1095        if "name" in data and data["name"] != nutrient.name:
1096            if hasattr(Nutrient, 'active'):
1097                if Nutrient.query.filter_by(name=data["name"], active=True).first():
1098                    raise BadRequest("Name already exists.")
1099            else:
1100                if Nutrient.query.filter_by(name=data["name"]).first():
1101                    raise BadRequest("Name already exists.")
1102            nutrient.name = data["name"]
1103        if "symbol" in data:
1104            nutrient.symbol = data["symbol"]
1105        if "unit" in data:
1106            nutrient.unit = data["unit"]
1107        db.session.commit()
1108        response_data = self._serialize_nutrient(nutrient)
1109        json_data = json.dumps(response_data, ensure_ascii=False, indent=4)
1110        return Response(json_data, status=200, mimetype="application/json")
1111    
1112    def _delete_nutrient(self, nutrient_id=None, nutrient_ids=None):
1113        """Elimina un nutriente marcándolo como inactivo."""
1114        claims = get_jwt()
1115        if nutrient_id and nutrient_ids:
1116            raise BadRequest("Solo se puede especificar nutrient_id o nutrient_ids, no ambos.")
1117        if nutrient_id:
1118            nutrient = Nutrient.query.get_or_404(nutrient_id)
1119            if hasattr(nutrient, 'active'):
1120                nutrient.active = False
1121            else:
1122                db.session.delete(nutrient)
1123            db.session.commit()
1124            return jsonify({"message": "Nutrient deleted successfully"}), 200
1125        if nutrient_ids:
1126            deleted_nutrients = []
1127            for nutrient_id in nutrient_ids:
1128                nutrient = Nutrient.query.get(nutrient_id)
1129                if not nutrient:
1130                    continue
1131                if hasattr(nutrient, 'active'):
1132                    nutrient.active = False
1133                else:
1134                    db.session.delete(nutrient)
1135                deleted_nutrients.append(nutrient.name)
1136                db.session.commit()
1137                deleted_nutrients_str = ", ".join(deleted_nutrients)
1138            return jsonify({"message": f"Nutrients {deleted_nutrients_str} deleted successfully"}), 200
1139        if not deleted_nutrients:
1140            return jsonify({"error": "No nutrients were deleted due to permission restrictions"}), 403
1141    
1142    def _has_access(self, nutrient, claims):
1143        """Verifica si el usuario actual tiene acceso al recurso."""
1144        user_role = claims.get("rol")
1145        user_id = claims.get("id")
1146        if user_role == RoleEnum.ADMINISTRATOR.value:
1147            return True
1148        if user_role == RoleEnum.RESELLER.value:
1149            reseller_package = ResellerPackage.query.filter_by(
1150                reseller_id=user_id
1151            ).first()
1152            return any(
1153                org.id in [o.id for o in reseller_package.organizations]
1154                for org in nutrient.user.organizations
1155            )
1156        return user_id == nutrient.user_id
1157    
1158    def _serialize_nutrient(self, nutrient):
1159        """Serializa un objeto Nutrient a un diccionario."""
1160        return {
1161            "id": nutrient.id,
1162            "name": nutrient.name,
1163            "symbol": nutrient.symbol,
1164            "unit": nutrient.unit,
1165            "description": nutrient.description,
1166            "created_at": nutrient.created_at.isoformat(),
1167            "updated_at": nutrient.updated_at.isoformat(),
1168        }

1170# Vista para análisis de hojas (leaf_analyses)
1171class LeafAnalysisView(MethodView):
1172    """Clase para gestionar operaciones CRUD sobre análisis de hojas."""
1173    decorators = [jwt_required()]
1174    
1175    @check_permission(required_roles=["administrator", "reseller"])
1176    def get(self, leaf_analysis_id=None):
1177        """
1178        Obtiene una lista de análisis de hojas o un análisis de hoja específico.
1179        Args:
1180            leaf_analysis_id (str, optional): ID del análisis de hoja a consultar.
1181        Returns:
1182            JSON: Lista de análisis de hojas o detalles de un análisis de hoja específico.
1183        """
1184        if leaf_analysis_id:
1185            return self._get_leaf_analysis(leaf_analysis_id)
1186        return self._get_leaf_analysis_list()
1187    
1188    @check_permission(required_roles=["administrator", "reseller"])
1189    def post(self):
1190        """
1191        Crea un nuevo análisis de hoja.
1192        Returns:
1193            JSON: Detalles del análisis de hoja creado.
1194        """
1195        data = request.get_json()
1196        if not data or not all(k in data for k in ("common_analysis_id",)):
1197            raise BadRequest("Missing required fields.")
1198        return self._create_leaf_analysis(data)
1199    
1200    @check_permission(resource_owner_check=True)
1201    def put(self, leaf_analysis_id):
1202        """
1203        Actualiza un análisis de hoja existente.
1204        Args:
1205            leaf_analysis_id (str): ID del análisis de hoja a actualizar.
1206        Returns:
1207            JSON: Detalles del análisis de hoja actualizado.
1208        """
1209        data = request.get_json()
1210        if not data or not leaf_analysis_id:
1211            raise BadRequest("Missing leaf_analysis_id or data.")
1212        return self._update_leaf_analysis(leaf_analysis_id, data)
1213    
1214    @check_permission(resource_owner_check=True)
1215    def delete(self, leaf_analysis_id=None):
1216        """
1217        Elimina un análisis de hoja existente.
1218        Args:
1219            leaf_analysis_id (str): ID del análisis de hoja a eliminar.
1220        Returns:
1221            JSON: Mensaje de confirmación.
1222        """
1223        data = request.get_json()
1224        if data and "ids" in data:
1225            return self._delete_leaf_analysis(leaf_analysis_ids=data["ids"])
1226        if leaf_analysis_id:
1227            return self._delete_leaf_analysis(leaf_analysis_id=leaf_analysis_id)
1228        raise BadRequest("Missing leaf_analysis_id.")
1229    
1230    # Métodos auxiliares
1231    def _get_leaf_analysis_list(self):
1232        """Obtiene una lista de todos los análisis de hojas activos."""
1233        claims = get_jwt()
1234        user_role = claims.get("rol")
1235        user_id = claims.get("id")
1236        if user_role == RoleEnum.ADMINISTRATOR.value:
1237            if hasattr(LeafAnalysis, 'active'):
1238                leaf_analyses = LeafAnalysis.query.filter_by(active=True).all()
1239            else:
1240                leaf_analyses = LeafAnalysis.query.all()
1241        elif user_role == RoleEnum.RESELLER.value:
1242            reseller_package = ResellerPackage.query.filter_by(
1243                reseller_id=user_id
1244            ).first()
1245            if not reseller_package:
1246                raise NotFound("Reseller package not found.")
1247            leaf_analyses = []
1248            for org in reseller_package.organizations:
1249                leaf_analyses.extend(org.leaf_analyses)
1250        else:
1251            raise Forbidden("Only administrators and resellers can list leaf_analyses.")
1252        response_data = [self._serialize_leaf_analysis(leaf_analysis) for leaf_analysis in leaf_analyses]
1253        json_data = json.dumps(response_data, ensure_ascii=False, indent=4)
1254        return Response(json_data, status=200, mimetype="application/json")
1255    
1256    def _get_leaf_analysis(self, leaf_analysis_id):
1257        """Obtiene los detalles de un análisis de hoja específico."""
1258        leaf_analysis = LeafAnalysis.query.get_or_404(leaf_analysis_id)
1259        claims = get_jwt()
1260        if not self._has_access(leaf_analysis, claims):
1261            raise Forbidden("You do not have access to this leaf_analysis.")
1262        response_data = self._serialize_leaf_analysis(leaf_analysis)
1263        json_data = json.dumps(response_data, ensure_ascii=False, indent=4)
1264        return Response(json_data, status=200, mimetype="application/json")
1265

1270                raise BadRequest("LeafAnalysis already exists.")

1272            if LeafAnalysis.query.filter_by(common_analysis_id=data["common_analysis_id"]).first():
1273                raise BadRequest("LeafAnalysis already exists.")

1275            common_analysis_id=data["common_analysis_id"],
1276        )

1278        db.session.commit()
1279        response_data = self._serialize_leaf_analysis(leaf_analysis)
1280        json_data = json.dumps(response_data, ensure_ascii=False, indent=4)
1281        return Response(json_data, status=201, mimetype="application/json")
1282

1299            leaf_analysis = LeafAnalysis.query.get_or_404(leaf_analysis_id)
1300            if hasattr(leaf_analysis, 'active'):
1301                leaf_analysis.active = False
1302            else:

1304            db.session.commit()

1311                    continue
1312                if hasattr(leaf_analysis, 'active'):
1313                    leaf_analysis.active = False
1314                else:
1315                    db.session.delete(leaf_analysis)
1316                deleted_leaf_analyses.append(leaf_analysis.common_analysis_id)
1317                db.session.commit()
1318                deleted_leaf_analyses_str = ", ".join(map(str, deleted_leaf_analyses))
1319            return jsonify({"message": f"LeafAnalyses {deleted_leaf_analyses_str} deleted successfully"}), 200
1320        if not deleted_leaf_analyses:
1321            return jsonify({"error": "No leaf_analyses were deleted due to permission restrictions"}), 403

1328            return True

1331                reseller_id=user_id

1530class ObjectiveView(MethodView):
1531    """Class to manage CRUD operations for nutrient objectives tied to crops"""
1532    decorators = [jwt_required()]
1533
1534    @check_permission(required_roles=["administrator", "reseller"])
1535    def get(self, objective_id=None):
1536        """
1537        Retrieve a list of objectives or a specific objective.
1538        Args:
1539            objective_id (int, optional): ID of the objective to retrieve.
1540        Returns:
1541            JSON: List of objectives or details of a specific objective.
1542        """
1543        if objective_id:
1544            return self._get_objective(objective_id)
1545        return self._get_objective_list()
1546
1547    @check_permission(required_roles=["administrator", "reseller"])
1548    def post(self):
1549        """
1550        Create a new objective with nutrient targets, protein, rest, and target value.
1551        Expected JSON data:
1552            {
1553                "crop_id": int,
1554                "target_value": float,
1555                "protein": float (optional),
1556                "rest": float (optional),
1557                "nutrient_targets": {"nutrient_<id>": float, ...} (e.g., "nutrient_1": 10.5)
1558            }
1559        Returns:
1560            JSON: Details of the created objective.
1561        """
1562        data = request.get_json()
1563        required_fields = ["crop_id", "target_value"]
1564        if not data or not all(k in data for k in required_fields):
1565            raise BadRequest("Missing required fields: crop_id and target_value.")
1566        return self._create_objective(data)
1567
1568    @check_permission(resource_owner_check=True)
1569    def put(self, id: int):
1570        """
1571        Update an existing objective.
1572        Args:
1573            objective_id (int): ID of the objective to update.
1574        Expected JSON data: Same as POST, with optional fields.
1575        Returns:
1576            JSON: Details of the updated objective.
1577        """
1578        data = request.get_json()
1579        objective_id = id
1580
1581        if not data or not objective_id:
1582            raise BadRequest("Missing objective_id or data.")
1583        return self._update_objective(objective_id, data)
1584
1585    @check_permission(resource_owner_check=True)
1586    def delete(self, id=None):
1587        """
1588        Delete an existing objective.
1589        Args:
1590            objective_id (int): ID of the objective to delete.
1591        Returns:
1592            JSON: Confirmation message.
1593        """
1594        objective_id = id
1595
1596        if not objective_id:
1597            raise BadRequest("Missing objective_id.")
1598        return self._delete_objective(objective_id)
1599
1600    # Helper Methods
1601    def _get_objective_list(self):
1602        """Retrieve a list of all objectives based on user role"""
1603        claims = get_jwt()
1604        user_role = claims.get("rol")
1605        if user_role == RoleEnum.ADMINISTRATOR.value:
1606            objectives = Objective.query.all()
1607        elif user_role == RoleEnum.RESELLER.value:
1608            reseller_package = ResellerPackage.query.filter_by(
1609                reseller_id=claims.get("org_id")
1610            ).first()
1611            if not reseller_package:
1612                raise NotFound("Reseller package not found.")
1613            objectives = []
1614            for organization in reseller_package.organizations:
1615                for crop in organization.crops:
1616                    objectives.extend(crop.objectives)
1617        else:
1618            raise Forbidden("Only administrators and resellers can list objectives.")
1619        response_data = [self._serialize_objective(obj) for obj in objectives]
1620        json_data = json.dumps(response_data, ensure_ascii=False, indent=4)
1621        return Response(json_data, status=200, mimetype="application/json")
1622
1623    def _get_objective(self, objective_id):
1624        """Retrieve details of a specific objective"""
1625        objective = Objective.query.get_or_404(objective_id)
1626        claims = get_jwt()
1627        if not self._has_access(objective, claims):
1628            raise Forbidden("You do not have access to this objective.")
1629        response_data = self._serialize_objective(objective)
1630        json_data = json.dumps(response_data, ensure_ascii=False, indent=4)
1631        return Response(json_data, status=200, mimetype="application/json")
1632
1633    def _create_objective(self, data):
1634        """Create a new objective with nutrient targets"""
1635        crop_id = data["crop_id"]
1636        target_value = float(data["target_value"])  # Convert to float
1637        protein = data.get("protein")  # Optional
1638        rest = data.get("rest")  # Optional
1639
1640        # Validate crop exists
1641        crop = Crop.query.get(crop_id)
1642        if not crop:
1643            raise BadRequest("Invalid crop ID.")
1644
1645        # Convert optional fields to float if provided
1646        protein = float(protein) if protein is not None else None
1647        rest = float(rest) if rest is not None else None
1648
1649        # Create new objective
1650        new_objective = Objective(
1651            crop_id=crop_id,
1652            target_value=target_value,
1653            protein=protein,
1654            rest=rest
1655        )
1656        db.session.add(new_objective)
1657        db.session.flush()  # Ensure new_objective.id is available
1658
1659        # Handle nutrient targets
1660        nutrient_targets = {k: v for k, v in data.items() if k.startswith("nutrient_")}
1661        for key, value in nutrient_targets.items():
1662            nutrient_id = int(key.split("_")[1])
1663            nutrient = Nutrient.query.get(nutrient_id)
1664            if not nutrient:
1665                raise BadRequest(f"Invalid nutrient ID: {nutrient_id}")
1666            try:
1667                target_value_float = float(value)  # Convert to float
1668                if target_value_float <= 0:
1669                    raise BadRequest(f"Target value for {nutrient.name} must be positive.")
1670                insert_stmt = objective_nutrients.insert().values(
1671                    objective_id=new_objective.id,
1672                    nutrient_id=nutrient_id,
1673                    target_value=target_value_float
1674                )
1675                db.session.execute(insert_stmt)
1676            except ValueError:
1677                raise BadRequest(f"Invalid numeric value for {nutrient.name}: '{value}'")
1678
1679        db.session.commit()
1680        response_data = self._serialize_objective(new_objective)
1681        json_data = json.dumps(response_data, ensure_ascii=False, indent=4)
1682        return Response(json_data, status=201, mimetype="application/json")
1683
1684    def _update_objective(self, objective_id, data):
1685        """Update an existing objective"""
1686        objective = Objective.query.get_or_404(objective_id)
1687
1688        # Update main fields if provided
1689        if "crop_id" in data:
1690            crop = Crop.query.get(data["crop_id"])
1691            if not crop:
1692                raise BadRequest("Invalid crop ID.")
1693            objective.crop_id = data["crop_id"]
1694        if "target_value" in data:
1695            objective.target_value = data["target_value"]
1696        if "protein" in data:
1697            objective.protein = data["protein"]
1698        if "rest" in data:
1699            objective.rest = data["rest"]
1700
1701        # Handle nutrient targets if provided
1702        nutrient_targets = {k: v for k, v in data.items() if k.startswith("nutrient_")}
1703        if nutrient_targets:
1704            # Delete existing nutrient targets
1705            db.session.query(objective_nutrients).filter_by(objective_id=objective.id).delete()
1706            # Add new nutrient targets
1707            for key, value in nutrient_targets.items():
1708                nutrient_id = int(key.split("_")[1])
1709                nutrient = Nutrient.query.get(nutrient_id)
1710                if not nutrient:
1711                    raise BadRequest(f"Invalid nutrient ID: {nutrient_id}")
1712                # Convert value to float (or int) and validate
1713                try:
1714                    target_value = float(value)  # Use float to handle decimal values; use int if only integers are expected
1715                    if target_value <= 0:
1716                        raise BadRequest(f"Target value for {nutrient.name} must be positive.")
1717                    insert_stmt = objective_nutrients.insert().values(
1718                        objective_id=objective.id,
1719                        nutrient_id=nutrient_id,
1720                        target_value=target_value
1721                    )
1722                    db.session.execute(insert_stmt)
1723                except ValueError:
1724                    raise BadRequest(f"Target value for {nutrient.name} must be a valid number.")
1725
1726        db.session.commit()
1727        response_data = self._serialize_objective(objective)
1728        json_data = json.dumps(response_data, ensure_ascii=False, indent=4)
1729        return Response(json_data, status=200, mimetype="application/json")
1730
1731    def _delete_objective(self, objective_id):
1732        """Delete an existing objective"""
1733        objective = Objective.query.get_or_404(objective_id)
1734        db.session.delete(objective)
1735        db.session.commit()
1736        return jsonify({"message": "Objective deleted successfully"}), 200
1737
1738    def _has_access(self, objective, claims):
1739        """Check if the current user has access to the objective"""
1740        user_role = claims.get("rol")
1741        if user_role == RoleEnum.ADMINISTRATOR.value:
1742            return True
1743        if user_role == RoleEnum.RESELLER.value:
1744            reseller_package = ResellerPackage.query.filter_by(
1745                reseller_id=claims.get("org_id")
1746            ).first()
1747            if not reseller_package:
1748                return False
1749            return any(
1750                org.id == objective.crop.organization.id
1751                for org in reseller_package.organizations
1752            )
1753        return False
1754
1755    def _serialize_objective(self, objective):
1756        """Serialize an Objective object to a dictionary"""
1757        nutrient_targets = db.session.query(objective_nutrients).filter_by(
1758            objective_id=objective.id
1759        ).all()
1760        nutrient_targets_dict = [
1761            {
1762                "nutrient_id": target.nutrient_id,
1763                "target_value": target.target_value,
1764                "nutrient_name": Nutrient.query.get(target.nutrient_id).name,
1765                "nutrient_symbol": Nutrient.query.get(target.nutrient_id).symbol,
1766                "nutrient_unit": Nutrient.query.get(target.nutrient_id).unit,
1767            }
1768            for target in nutrient_targets
1769        ]
1770        return {
1771            "id": objective.id,
1772            "crop_id": objective.crop_id,
1773            "crop_name": objective.crop.name,
1774            "target_value": objective.target_value,
1775            "protein": objective.protein,
1776            "rest": objective.rest,
1777            "created_at": objective.created_at.isoformat(),
1778            "updated_at": objective.updated_at.isoformat(),
1779            "nutrient_targets": nutrient_targets_dict,
1780        }
1781

class FarmView(flask.views.MethodView): 
 21class FarmView(MethodView):
 22    """Clase para gestionar operaciones CRUD sobre granjas."""
 23    decorators = [jwt_required()]
 24    
 25    @check_permission(required_roles=["administrator", "reseller"])
 26    def get(self, farm_id=None):
 27        """
 28        Obtiene una lista de granjas o una granja específica.
 29        Args:
 30            farm_id (str, optional): ID de la granja a consultar.
 31        Returns:
 32            JSON: Lista de granjas o detalles de una granja específica.
 33        """
 34        if farm_id:
 35            return self._get_farm(farm_id)
 36        return self._get_farm_list()
 37    
 38    @check_permission(required_roles=["administrator", "reseller"])
 39    def post(self):
 40        """
 41        Crea una nueva granja.
 42        Returns:
 43            JSON: Detalles de la granja creada.
 44        """
 45        data = request.get_json()
 46        if not data or not all(k in data for k in ("name", "org_id")):
 47            raise BadRequest("Missing required fields.")
 48        return self._create_farm(data)
 49    
 50    @check_permission(resource_owner_check=True)
 51    def put(self, id: int):
 52        """
 53        Actualiza una granja existente.
 54        Args:
 55            farm_id (str): ID de la granja a actualizar.
 56        Returns:
 57            JSON: Detalles de la granja actualizada.
 58        """
 59        data = request.get_json()
 60        farm_id = data.get("id")
 61        if not data or not farm_id:
 62            raise BadRequest("Missing farm_id or data.")
 63        return self._update_farm(farm_id, data)
 64    
 65    @check_permission(resource_owner_check=True)
 66    def delete(self, farm_id=None):
 67        """
 68        Elimina una granja existente.
 69        Args:
 70            farm_id (str): ID de la granja a eliminar.
 71        Returns:
 72            JSON: Mensaje de confirmación.
 73        """
 74        data = request.get_json()
 75        if data and "ids" in data:
 76            return self._delete_farm(farm_ids=data["ids"])
 77        if farm_id:
 78            return self._delete_farm(farm_id=farm_id)
 79        raise BadRequest("Missing farm_id.")
 80    
 81    # Métodos auxiliares
 82    def _get_farm_list(self):
 83        """Obtiene una lista de todas las granjas activas."""
 84        claims = get_jwt()
 85        user_role = claims.get("rol")
 86        org_id = claims.get("org_id")
 87        if user_role == RoleEnum.ADMINISTRATOR.value:
 88            if hasattr(Farm, 'active'):
 89                farms = Farm.query.filter_by(active=True).all()
 90            else:
 91                farms = Farm.query.all()
 92        elif user_role == RoleEnum.RESELLER.value:
 93            reseller_package = ResellerPackage.query.filter_by(
 94                reseller_id=org_id
 95            ).first()
 96            if not reseller_package:
 97                raise NotFound("Reseller package not found.")
 98            farms = []
 99            for org in reseller_package.organizations:
100                farms.extend(org.farms)
101        else:
102            raise Forbidden("Only administrators and resellers can list farms.")
103        response_data = [self._serialize_farm(farm) for farm in farms]
104        json_data = json.dumps(response_data, ensure_ascii=False, indent=4)
105        return Response(json_data, status=200, mimetype="application/json")
106    
107    def _get_farm(self, farm_id):
108        """Obtiene los detalles de una granja específica."""
109        farm = Farm.query.get_or_404(farm_id)
110        claims = get_jwt()
111        if not self._has_access(farm, claims):
112            raise Forbidden("You do not have access to this farm.")
113        response_data = self._serialize_farm(farm)
114        json_data = json.dumps(response_data, ensure_ascii=False, indent=4)
115        return Response(json_data, status=200, mimetype="application/json")
116    
117    def _create_farm(self, data):
118        """Crea una nueva granja con los datos proporcionados."""
119        if hasattr(Farm, 'active'):
120            if Farm.query.filter_by(name=data["name"], org_id=data["org_id"], active=True).first():
121                raise BadRequest("Name already exists.")
122        else:
123            if Farm.query.filter_by(name=data["name"], org_id=data["org_id"]).first():
124                raise BadRequest("Name already exists.")
125        farm = Farm(
126            name=data["name"],
127            org_id=data["org_id"],
128        )
129        db.session.add(farm)
130        db.session.commit()
131        response_data = self._serialize_farm(farm)
132        json_data = json.dumps(response_data, ensure_ascii=False, indent=4)
133        return Response(json_data, status=201, mimetype="application/json")
134    
135    def _update_farm(self, farm_id, data):
136        """Actualiza los datos de una granja existente."""
137        farm = Farm.query.get_or_404(farm_id)
138        if "name" in data and data["name"] != farm.name:
139            if hasattr(Farm, 'active'):
140                if Farm.query.filter_by(name=data["name"], org_id=farm.org_id, active=True).first():
141                    raise BadRequest("Name already exists.")
142            else:
143                if Farm.query.filter_by(name=data["name"], org_id=farm.org_id).first():
144                    raise BadRequest("Name already exists.")
145            farm.name = data["name"]
146        if "org_id" in data:
147            farm.org_id = data["org_id"]
148        db.session.commit()
149        response_data = self._serialize_farm(farm)
150        json_data = json.dumps(response_data, ensure_ascii=False, indent=4)
151        return Response(json_data, status=200, mimetype="application/json")
152    
153    def _delete_farm(self, farm_id=None, farm_ids=None):
154        """Elimina una granja marcándola como inactiva."""
155        claims = get_jwt()
156        if farm_id and farm_ids:
157            raise BadRequest("Solo se puede especificar farm_id o farm_ids, no ambos.")
158        if farm_id:
159            farm = Farm.query.get_or_404(farm_id)
160            if hasattr(farm, 'active'):
161                farm.active = False
162            else:
163                db.session.delete(farm)
164            db.session.commit()
165            return jsonify({"message": "Farm deleted successfully"}), 200
166        if farm_ids:
167            deleted_farms = []
168            for farm_id in farm_ids:
169                farm = Farm.query.get(farm_id)
170                if not farm:
171                    continue
172                if hasattr(farm, 'active'):
173                    farm.active = False
174                else:
175                    db.session.delete(farm)
176                deleted_farms.append(farm.name)
177                db.session.commit()
178            deleted_farms_str = ", ".join(deleted_farms)
179            return jsonify({"message": f"Farms {deleted_farms_str} deleted successfully"}), 200
180        if not deleted_farms:
181            return jsonify({"error": "No farms were deleted due to permission restrictions"}), 403
182    
183    def _has_access(self, farm, claims):
184        """Verifica si el usuario actual tiene acceso al recurso."""
185        user_role = claims.get("rol")
186        org_id = claims.get("org_id")
187        if user_role == RoleEnum.ADMINISTRATOR.value:
188            return True
189        if user_role == RoleEnum.RESELLER.value:
190            reseller_package = ResellerPackage.query.filter_by(
191                reseller_id=org_id
192            ).first()
193            return any(
194                org.id in [o.id for o in reseller_package.organizations]
195                for org in farm.organization
196            )
197        return farm.org_id == claims.get("org_id")
198    
199    def _serialize_farm(self, farm):
200        """Serializa un objeto Farm a un diccionario."""
201        return {
202            "id": farm.id,
203            "name": farm.name,
204            "org_id": farm.org_id,
205            "org_name": farm.organization.name if farm.organization else "",
206            "lots": [lot.name for lot in farm.lots],
207            "created_at": farm.created_at.isoformat(),
208            "updated_at": farm.updated_at.isoformat(),
209        }

class LotView(flask.views.MethodView): 
213class LotView(MethodView):
214    """Clase para gestionar operaciones CRUD sobre lotes."""
215    decorators = [jwt_required()]
216    
217    @check_permission(required_roles=["administrator", "reseller"])
218    def get(self, lot_id=None):
219        """
220        Obtiene una lista de lotes o un lote específico.
221        Args:
222            lot_id (str, optional): ID del lote a consultar.
223        Returns:
224            JSON: Lista de lotes o detalles de un lote específico.
225        """
226        if lot_id:
227            return self._get_lot(lot_id)
228        return self._get_lot_list()
229    
230    @check_permission(required_roles=["administrator", "reseller"])
231    def post(self):
232        """
233        Crea un nuevo lote.
234        Returns:
235            JSON: Detalles del lote creado.
236        """
237        data = request.get_json()
238        if not data or not all(k in data for k in ("name", "area", "farm_id")):
239            raise BadRequest("Missing required fields.")
240        return self._create_lot(data)
241    
242    @check_permission(resource_owner_check=True)
243    def put(self, id=None):
244        """
245        Actualiza un lote existente.
246        Args:
247            lot_id (str): ID del lote a actualizar.
248        Returns:
249            JSON: Detalles del lote actualizado.
250        """
251        data = request.get_json()
252        lot_id = data.get("id")
253        if not data or not lot_id:
254            raise BadRequest("Missing lot_id or data.")
255        return self._update_lot(lot_id, data)
256    
257    @check_permission(resource_owner_check=True)
258    def delete(self, id=None):
259        """
260        Elimina un lote existente.
261        Args:
262            lot_id (str): ID del lote a eliminar.
263        Returns:
264            JSON: Mensaje de confirmación.
265        """
266        data = request.get_json()
267        if data and "ids" in data:
268            return self._delete_lot(lot_ids=data["ids"])
269        if id:
270            return self._delete_lot(lot_id=id)
271
272        raise BadRequest("Missing lot_id.")
273    
274    # Métodos auxiliares
275    def _get_lot_list(self, filter_by=None):
276        """Obtiene una lista de lotes activos según el rol del usuario."""
277        claims = get_jwt()
278        user_role = claims.get("rol")
279        user_id = claims.get("id")
280        lots = []  # Lista de lotes que se devolverá
281        if user_role == RoleEnum.ADMINISTRATOR.value:
282            query = Lot.query
283            if hasattr(Lot, 'active'):
284                query = query.filter_by(active=True)
285            if filter_by:
286                query = query.filter_by(farm_id=filter_by)
287            lots = query.all()
288        elif user_role == RoleEnum.RESELLER.value:
289            reseller_package = ResellerPackage.query.options(
290                joinedload(ResellerPackage.organizations).joinedload("lots")
291            ).filter_by(reseller_id=user_id).first()
292            if not reseller_package:
293                raise NotFound("Reseller package not found.")
294            # Usamos un conjunto para evitar duplicados
295            lots = {lot for org in reseller_package.organizations for lot in org.lots}
296            # Convertimos a lista para la serialización final
297            lots = list(lots)
298        else:
299            raise Forbidden("Only administrators and resellers can list lots.")
300        # Serialización y respuesta
301        response_data = [self._serialize_lot(lot) for lot in lots]
302        json_data = json.dumps(response_data, ensure_ascii=False, indent=4)
303        return Response(json_data, status=200, mimetype="application/json")
304    
305    def _get_lot(self, lot_id):
306        """Obtiene los detalles de un lote específico."""
307        lot = Lot.query.get_or_404(lot_id)
308        claims = get_jwt()
309        if not self._has_access(lot, claims):
310            raise Forbidden("You do not have access to this lot.")
311        response_data = self._serialize_lot(lot)
312        json_data = json.dumps(response_data, ensure_ascii=False, indent=4)
313        return Response(json_data, status=200, mimetype="application/json")
314    
315    def _create_lot(self, data):
316        """Crea un nuevo lote con los datos proporcionados."""
317        if hasattr(Lot, 'active'):
318            if Lot.query.filter_by(name=data["name"], active=True).first():
319                raise BadRequest("Name already exists.")
320        else:
321            if Lot.query.filter_by(name=data["name"]).first():
322                raise BadRequest("Name already exists.")
323        lot = Lot(
324            name=data["name"],
325            area=data["area"],
326            farm_id=data["farm_id"],
327        )
328        db.session.add(lot)
329        db.session.commit()
330        response_data = self._serialize_lot(lot)
331        json_data = json.dumps(response_data, ensure_ascii=False, indent=4)
332        return Response(json_data, status=201, mimetype="application/json")
333    
334    def _update_lot(self, lot_id, data):
335        """Actualiza los datos de un lote existente."""
336        lot = Lot.query.get_or_404(lot_id)
337        if "name" in data and data["name"] != lot.name:
338            if hasattr(Lot, 'active'):
339                if Lot.query.filter_by(name=data["name"], active=True).first():
340                    raise BadRequest("Name already exists.")
341            else:
342                if Lot.query.filter_by(name=data["name"]).first():
343                    raise BadRequest("Name already exists.")
344            lot.name = data["name"]
345        if "area" in data:
346            lot.area = data["area"]
347        if "farm_id" in data:
348            lot.farm_id = data["farm_id"]
349        db.session.commit()
350        response_data = self._serialize_lot(lot)
351        json_data = json.dumps(response_data, ensure_ascii=False, indent=4)
352        return Response(json_data, status=200, mimetype="application/json")
353    
354    def _delete_lot(self, lot_id=None, lot_ids=None):
355        """Elimina un lote marcándolo como inactivo."""
356        claims = get_jwt()
357        if lot_id and lot_ids:
358            raise BadRequest("Solo se puede especificar lot_id o lot_ids, no ambos.")
359        if lot_id:
360            lot = Lot.query.get_or_404(lot_id)
361            if hasattr(lot, 'active'):
362                lot.active = False
363            else:
364                db.session.delete(lot)
365            db.session.commit()
366            return jsonify({"message": "Lot deleted successfully"}), 200
367        if lot_ids:
368            deleted_lots = []
369            for lot_id in lot_ids:
370                lot = Lot.query.get(lot_id)
371                if not lot:
372                    continue
373                if hasattr(lot, 'active'):
374                    lot.active = False
375                else:
376                    db.session.delete(lot)
377                deleted_lots.append(lot.name)
378                db.session.commit()
379                deleted_lots_str = ", ".join(deleted_lots)
380            return jsonify({"message": f"Lots {deleted_lots_str} deleted successfully"}), 200
381        if not deleted_lots:
382            return jsonify({"error": "No lots were deleted due to permission restrictions"}), 403
383    
384    def _has_access(self, lot, claims):
385        """Verifica si el usuario actual tiene acceso al recurso."""
386        user_role = claims.get("rol")
387        user_id = claims.get("id")
388        if user_role == RoleEnum.ADMINISTRATOR.value:
389            return True
390        if user_role == RoleEnum.RESELLER.value:
391            reseller_package = ResellerPackage.query.filter_by(
392                reseller_id=user_id
393            ).first()
394            return any(
395                org.id in [o.id for o in reseller_package.organizations]
396                for org in lot.farm.user.organizations
397            )
398        return user_id == lot.farm.user_id
399    
400    def _serialize_lot(self, lot):
401        """Serializa un objeto Lot a un diccionario."""
402        return {
403            "id": lot.id,
404            "name": lot.name,
405            "area": lot.area,
406            "farm_id": lot.farm_id,
407            "farm_name": lot.farm.name if lot.farm else "",
408            "created_at": lot.created_at.isoformat(),
409            "updated_at": lot.updated_at.isoformat(),
410        }
