477    def _get_crop_list(self):
478        """Obtiene una lista de todos los cultivos activos."""
479        claims = get_jwt()
480        user_role = claims.get("rol")
481        user_id = claims.get("id")
482        if user_role == RoleEnum.ADMINISTRATOR.value:
483            if hasattr(Crop, 'active'):
484                crops = Crop.query.filter_by(active=True).all()
485            else:
486                crops = Crop.query.all()
487        elif user_role == RoleEnum.RESELLER.value:
488            reseller_package = ResellerPackage.query.filter_by(
489                reseller_id=user_id
490            ).first()
491            if not reseller_package:
492                raise NotFound("Reseller package not found.")
493            crops = []
494            for org in reseller_package.organizations:
495                crops.extend(org.crops)
496        else:
497            raise Forbidden("Only administrators and resellers can list crops.")
498        response_data = [self._serialize_crop(crop) for crop in crops]
499        json_data = json.dumps(response_data, ensure_ascii=False, indent=4)
500        return Response(json_data, status=200, mimetype="application/json")

508        response_data = self._serialize_crop(crop)
509        json_data = json.dumps(response_data, ensure_ascii=False, indent=4)
510        return Response(json_data, status=200, mimetype="application/json")

703                raise BadRequest("LotCrop already exists.")

705            lot_id=data["lot_id"],
706            crop_id=data["crop_id"],
707            start_date=data["start_date"],
708        )

710        db.session.commit()
711        response_data = self._serialize_lot_crop(lot_crop)
712        json_data = json.dumps(response_data, ensure_ascii=False, indent=4)

715    def _update_lot_crop(self, lot_crop_id, data):
716        """Actualiza los datos de un lote de cultivo existente."""
717        lot_crop = LotCrop.query.get_or_404(lot_crop_id)
718        if "lot_id" in data and data["lot_id"] != lot_crop.lot_id:
719            if hasattr(LotCrop, 'active'):
720                if LotCrop.query.filter_by(lot_id=data["lot_id"], crop_id=lot_crop.crop_id, active=True).first():
721                    raise BadRequest("LotCrop already exists.")
722            else:
723                if LotCrop.query.filter_by(lot_id=data["lot_id"], crop_id=lot_crop.crop_id).first():
724                    raise BadRequest("LotCrop already exists.")
725            lot_crop.lot_id = data["lot_id"]
726        if "crop_id" in data:
727            lot_crop.crop_id = data["crop_id"]
728        if "start_date" in data:
729            lot_crop.start_date = data["start_date"]
730        db.session.commit()
731        response_data = self._serialize_lot_crop(lot_crop)
732        json_data = json.dumps(response_data, ensure_ascii=False, indent=4)
733        return Response(json_data, status=200, mimetype="application/json")
734    
735    def _delete_lot_crop(self, lot_crop_id=None, lot_crop_ids=None):
736        """Elimina un lote de cultivo marcándolo como inactivo."""
737        claims = get_jwt()
738        if lot_crop_id and lot_crop_ids:
739            raise BadRequest("Solo se puede especificar lot_crop_id o lot_crop_ids, no ambos.")
740        if lot_crop_id:
741            lot_crop = LotCrop.query.get_or_404(lot_crop_id)
742            if hasattr(lot_crop, 'active'):
743                lot_crop.active = False
744            else:
745                db.session.delete(lot_crop)
746            db.session.commit()
747            return jsonify({"message": "LotCrop deleted successfully"}), 200
748        if lot_crop_ids:
749            deleted_lot_crops = []
750            for lot_crop_id in lot_crop_ids:
751                lot_crop = LotCrop.query.get(lot_crop_id)
752                if not lot_crop:
753                    continue
754                if hasattr(lot_crop, 'active'):
755                    lot_crop.active = False
756                else:
757                    db.session.delete(lot_crop)
758                deleted_lot_crops.append(lot_crop.lot_id)
759                db.session.commit()
760                deleted_lot_crops_str = ", ".join(map(str, deleted_lot_crops))
761            return jsonify({"message": f"LotCrops {deleted_lot_crops_str} deleted successfully"}), 200
762        if not deleted_lot_crops:
763            return jsonify({"error": "No lot_crops were deleted due to permission restrictions"}), 403
764    
765    def _has_access(self, lot_crop, claims):
766        """Verifica si el usuario actual tiene acceso al recurso."""
767        user_role = claims.get("rol")
768        user_id = claims.get("id")
769        if user_role == RoleEnum.ADMINISTRATOR.value:
770            return True
771        if user_role == RoleEnum.RESELLER.value:
772            reseller_package = ResellerPackage.query.filter_by(
773                reseller_id=user_id
774            ).first()
775            return any(
776                org.id in [o.id for o in reseller_package.organizations]
777                for org in lot_crop.lot.farm.user.organizations
778            )
779        return user_id == lot_crop.lot.farm.user_id
780    
781    def _serialize_lot_crop(self, lot_crop):
782        """Serializa un objeto LotCrop a un diccionario."""
783        return {
784            "id": lot_crop.id,
785            "lot_id": lot_crop.lot_id,
786            "crop_id": lot_crop.crop_id,
787            "start_date": lot_crop.start_date,
788            "created_at": lot_crop.created_at.isoformat(),
789            "updated_at": lot_crop.updated_at.isoformat(),
790        }

853    # Métodos auxiliares
854    def _get_common_analysis_list(self):
855        """Obtiene una lista de todos los análisis comunes activos."""
856        claims = get_jwt()
857        user_role = claims.get("rol")
858        user_id = claims.get("id")
859        if user_role == RoleEnum.ADMINISTRATOR.value:
860            if hasattr(CommonAnalysis, 'active'):
861                common_analyses = CommonAnalysis.query.filter_by(active=True).all()
862            else:
863                common_analyses = CommonAnalysis.query.all()
864        elif user_role == RoleEnum.RESELLER.value:
865            reseller_package = ResellerPackage.query.filter_by(
866                reseller_id=user_id
867            ).first()
868            if not reseller_package:
869                raise NotFound("Reseller package not found.")
870            common_analyses = []
871            for org in reseller_package.organizations:
872                common_analyses.extend(org.common_analyses)
873        else:
874            raise Forbidden("Only administrators and resellers can list common_analyses.")
875        response_data = [self._serialize_common_analysis(common_analysis) for common_analysis in common_analyses]
876        json_data = json.dumps(response_data, ensure_ascii=False, indent=4)
877        return Response(json_data, status=200, mimetype="application/json")
878    
879    def _get_common_analysis(self, common_analysis_id):
880        """Obtiene los detalles de un análisis común específico."""
881        common_analysis = CommonAnalysis.query.get_or_404(common_analysis_id)
882        claims = get_jwt()
883        if not self._has_access(common_analysis, claims):
884            raise Forbidden("You do not have access to this common_analysis.")
885        response_data = self._serialize_common_analysis(common_analysis)
886        json_data = json.dumps(response_data, ensure_ascii=False, indent=4)
887        return Response(json_data, status=200, mimetype="application/json")

893                raise BadRequest("CommonAnalysis already exists.")
894        else:
895            if CommonAnalysis.query.filter_by(date=data["date"], lot_id=data["lot_id"]).first():
896                raise BadRequest("CommonAnalysis already exists.")
897        common_analysis = CommonAnalysis(
898            date=data["date"],
899            lot_id=data["lot_id"],
900        )
901        db.session.add(common_analysis)
902        db.session.commit()

904        json_data = json.dumps(response_data, ensure_ascii=False, indent=4)
905        return Response(json_data, status=201, mimetype="application/json")

1094        """Actualiza los datos de un nutriente existente."""
1095        nutrient = Nutrient.query.get_or_404(nutrient_id)
1096        if "name" in data and data["name"] != nutrient.name:
1097            if hasattr(Nutrient, 'active'):
1098                if Nutrient.query.filter_by(name=data["name"], active=True).first():
1099                    raise BadRequest("Name already exists.")
1100            else:
1101                if Nutrient.query.filter_by(name=data["name"]).first():
1102                    raise BadRequest("Name already exists.")
1103            nutrient.name = data["name"]
1104        if "symbol" in data:
1105            nutrient.symbol = data["symbol"]
1106        if "unit" in data:
1107            nutrient.unit = data["unit"]
1108        db.session.commit()
1109        response_data = self._serialize_nutrient(nutrient)
1110        json_data = json.dumps(response_data, ensure_ascii=False, indent=4)
1111        return Response(json_data, status=200, mimetype="application/json")
1112    
1113    def _delete_nutrient(self, nutrient_id=None, nutrient_ids=None):
1114        """Elimina un nutriente marcándolo como inactivo."""
1115        claims = get_jwt()
1116        if nutrient_id and nutrient_ids:
1117            raise BadRequest("Solo se puede especificar nutrient_id o nutrient_ids, no ambos.")
1118        if nutrient_id:
1119            nutrient = Nutrient.query.get_or_404(nutrient_id)
1120            if hasattr(nutrient, 'active'):
1121                nutrient.active = False
1122            else:
1123                db.session.delete(nutrient)
1124            db.session.commit()
1125            return jsonify({"message": "Nutrient deleted successfully"}), 200
1126        if nutrient_ids:
1127            deleted_nutrients = []
1128            for nutrient_id in nutrient_ids:
1129                nutrient = Nutrient.query.get(nutrient_id)
1130                if not nutrient:
1131                    continue
1132                if hasattr(nutrient, 'active'):
1133                    nutrient.active = False
1134                else:
1135                    db.session.delete(nutrient)
1136                deleted_nutrients.append(nutrient.name)
1137                db.session.commit()
1138                deleted_nutrients_str = ", ".join(deleted_nutrients)
1139            return jsonify({"message": f"Nutrients {deleted_nutrients_str} deleted successfully"}), 200
1140        if not deleted_nutrients:
1141            return jsonify({"error": "No nutrients were deleted due to permission restrictions"}), 403
1142    
1143    def _has_access(self, nutrient, claims):
1144        """Verifica si el usuario actual tiene acceso al recurso."""
1145        user_role = claims.get("rol")
1146        user_id = claims.get("id")
1147        if user_role == RoleEnum.ADMINISTRATOR.value:
1148            return True
1149        if user_role == RoleEnum.RESELLER.value:
1150            reseller_package = ResellerPackage.query.filter_by(
1151                reseller_id=user_id
1152            ).first()
1153            return any(
1154                org.id in [o.id for o in reseller_package.organizations]
1155                for org in nutrient.user.organizations
1156            )
1157        return user_id == nutrient.user_id
1158    
1159    def _serialize_nutrient(self, nutrient):
1160        """Serializa un objeto Nutrient a un diccionario."""
1161        return {
1162            "id": nutrient.id,
1163            "name": nutrient.name,
1164            "symbol": nutrient.symbol,
1165            "unit": nutrient.unit,
1166            "description": nutrient.description,
1167            "created_at": nutrient.created_at.isoformat(),
1168            "updated_at": nutrient.updated_at.isoformat(),
1169        }

1232    def _get_leaf_analysis_list(self):
1233        """Obtiene una lista de todos los análisis de hojas activos."""
1234        claims = get_jwt()
1235        user_role = claims.get("rol")
1236        user_id = claims.get("id")
1237        if user_role == RoleEnum.ADMINISTRATOR.value:
1238            if hasattr(LeafAnalysis, 'active'):
1239                leaf_analyses = LeafAnalysis.query.filter_by(active=True).all()
1240            else:
1241                leaf_analyses = LeafAnalysis.query.all()
1242        elif user_role == RoleEnum.RESELLER.value:

1244                reseller_id=user_id

1251        else:

1462        return Response(json_data, status=201, mimetype="application/json")
1463    
1464    def _update_nutrient_application(self, nutrient_application_id, data):
1465        """Actualiza los datos de una aplicación de nutriente existente."""
1466        nutrient_application = NutrientApplication.query.get_or_404(nutrient_application_id)
1467        if "date" in data:
1468            nutrient_application.date = data["date"]
1469        if "lot_id" in data:
1470            nutrient_application.lot_id = data["lot_id"]
1471        db.session.commit()
1472        response_data = self._serialize_nutrient_application(nutrient_application)
1473        json_data = json.dumps(response_data, ensure_ascii=False, indent=4)
1474        return Response(json_data, status=200, mimetype="application/json")
1475    
1476    def _delete_nutrient_application(self, nutrient_application_id=None, nutrient_application_ids=None):
1477        """Elimina una aplicación de nutriente marcándolo como inactivo."""
1478        claims = get_jwt()
1479        if nutrient_application_id and nutrient_application_ids:
1480            raise BadRequest("Solo se puede especificar nutrient_application_id o nutrient_application_ids, no ambos.")
1481        if nutrient_application_id:
1482            nutrient_application = NutrientApplication.query.get_or_404(nutrient_application_id)
1483            if hasattr(nutrient_application, 'active'):
1484                nutrient_application.active = False
1485            else:
1486                db.session.delete(nutrient_application)
1487            db.session.commit()
1488            return jsonify({"message": "NutrientApplication deleted successfully"}), 200
1489        if nutrient_application_ids:
1490            deleted_nutrient_applications = []
1491            for nutrient_application_id in nutrient_application_ids:
1492                nutrient_application = NutrientApplication.query.get(nutrient_application_id)
1493                if not nutrient_application:
1494                    continue
1495                if hasattr(nutrient_application, 'active'):
1496                    nutrient_application.active = False
1497                else:
1498                    db.session.delete(nutrient_application)
1499                deleted_nutrient_applications.append(nutrient_application.lot_id)
1500                db.session.commit()
1501                deleted_nutrient_applications_str = ", ".join(map(str, deleted_nutrient_applications))
1502            return jsonify({"message": f"NutrientApplications {deleted_nutrient_applications_str} deleted successfully"}), 200
1503        if not deleted_nutrient_applications:
1504            return jsonify({"error": "No nutrient_applications were deleted due to permission restrictions"}), 403
1505    
1506    def _has_access(self, nutrient_application, claims):
1507        """Verifica si el usuario actual tiene acceso al recurso."""
1508        user_role = claims.get("rol")
1509        user_id = claims.get("id")
1510        if user_role == RoleEnum.ADMINISTRATOR.value:
1511            return True
1512        if user_role == RoleEnum.RESELLER.value:
1513            reseller_package = ResellerPackage.query.filter_by(
1514                reseller_id=user_id
1515            ).first()
1516            return any(
1517                org.id in [o.id for o in reseller_package.organizations]
1518                for org in nutrient_application.lot.farm.user.organizations
1519            )
1520        return user_id == nutrient_application.lot.farm.user_id
1521    
1522    def _serialize_nutrient_application(self, nutrient_application):
1523        """Serializa un objeto NutrientApplication a un diccionario."""
1524        return {
1525            "id": nutrient_application.id,
1526            "date": nutrient_application.date,
1527            "lot_id": nutrient_application.lot_id,
1528            "created_at": nutrient_application.created_at.isoformat(),
1529            "updated_at": nutrient_application.updated_at.isoformat(),
1530        }

1602    def _get_objective_list(self):
1603        """Retrieve a list of all objectives based on user role"""
1604        claims = get_jwt()
1605        user_role = claims.get("rol")
1606        if user_role == RoleEnum.ADMINISTRATOR.value:
1607            objectives = Objective.query.all()
1608        elif user_role == RoleEnum.RESELLER.value:
1609            reseller_package = ResellerPackage.query.filter_by(
1610                reseller_id=claims.get("org_id")
1611            ).first()
1612            if not reseller_package:
1613                raise NotFound("Reseller package not found.")
1614            objectives = []
1615            for organization in reseller_package.organizations:
1616                for crop in organization.crops:
1617                    objectives.extend(crop.objectives)
1618        else:
1619            raise Forbidden("Only administrators and resellers can list objectives.")
1620        response_data = [self._serialize_objective(obj) for obj in objectives]
1621        json_data = json.dumps(response_data, ensure_ascii=False, indent=4)
1622        return Response(json_data, status=200, mimetype="application/json")
1623
1624    def _get_objective(self, objective_id):
1625        """Retrieve details of a specific objective"""
1626        objective = Objective.query.get_or_404(objective_id)
1627        claims = get_jwt()
1628        if not self._has_access(objective, claims):
1629            raise Forbidden("You do not have access to this objective.")
1630        response_data = self._serialize_objective(objective)
1631        json_data = json.dumps(response_data, ensure_ascii=False, indent=4)
1632        return Response(json_data, status=200, mimetype="application/json")

1634    def _create_objective(self, data):
1635        """Create a new objective with nutrient targets"""
1636        crop_id = data["crop_id"]
1637        target_value = float(data["target_value"])  # Convert to float
1638        protein = data.get("protein")  # Optional
1639        rest = data.get("rest")  # Optional
1640
1641        # Validate crop exists
1642        crop = Crop.query.get(crop_id)
1643        if not crop:
1644            raise BadRequest("Invalid crop ID.")
1645
1646        # Convert optional fields to float if provided
1647        protein = float(protein) if protein is not None else None
1648        rest = float(rest) if rest is not None else None
1649
1650        # Create new objective
1651        new_objective = Objective(
1652            crop_id=crop_id,
1653            target_value=target_value,
1654            protein=protein,
1655            rest=rest
1656        )
1657        db.session.add(new_objective)
1658        db.session.flush()  # Ensure new_objective.id is available
1659
1660        # Handle nutrient targets
1661        nutrient_targets = {k: v for k, v in data.items() if k.startswith("nutrient_")}
1662        for key, value in nutrient_targets.items():
1663            nutrient_id = int(key.split("_")[1])
1664            nutrient = Nutrient.query.get(nutrient_id)
1665            if not nutrient:
1666                raise BadRequest(f"Invalid nutrient ID: {nutrient_id}")
1667            try:
1668                target_value_float = float(value)  # Convert to float
1669                if target_value_float <= 0:
1670                    raise BadRequest(f"Target value for {nutrient.name} must be positive.")
1671                insert_stmt = objective_nutrients.insert().values(
1672                    objective_id=new_objective.id,
1673                    nutrient_id=nutrient_id,
1674                    target_value=target_value_float
1675                )
1676                db.session.execute(insert_stmt)
1677            except ValueError:
1678                raise BadRequest(f"Invalid numeric value for {nutrient.name}: '{value}'")
1679
1680        db.session.commit()
1681        response_data = self._serialize_objective(new_objective)
1682        json_data = json.dumps(response_data, ensure_ascii=False, indent=4)
1683        return Response(json_data, status=201, mimetype="application/json")
1684
1685    def _update_objective(self, objective_id, data):
1686        """Update an existing objective"""
1687        objective = Objective.query.get_or_404(objective_id)
1688
1689        # Update main fields if provided
1690        if "crop_id" in data:
1691            crop = Crop.query.get(data["crop_id"])
1692            if not crop:
1693                raise BadRequest("Invalid crop ID.")
1694            objective.crop_id = data["crop_id"]
1695        if "target_value" in data:
1696            objective.target_value = data["target_value"]
1697        if "protein" in data:
1698            objective.protein = data["protein"]
1699        if "rest" in data:
1700            objective.rest = data["rest"]
1701
1702        # Handle nutrient targets if provided
1703        nutrient_targets = {k: v for k, v in data.items() if k.startswith("nutrient_")}
1704        if nutrient_targets:
1705            # Delete existing nutrient targets
1706            db.session.query(objective_nutrients).filter_by(objective_id=objective.id).delete()
1707            # Add new nutrient targets
1708            for key, value in nutrient_targets.items():
1709                nutrient_id = int(key.split("_")[1])
1710                nutrient = Nutrient.query.get(nutrient_id)
1711                if not nutrient:
1712                    raise BadRequest(f"Invalid nutrient ID: {nutrient_id}")
1713                # Convert value to float (or int) and validate
1714                try:
1715                    target_value = float(value)  # Use float to handle decimal values; use int if only integers are expected
1716                    if target_value <= 0:
1717                        raise BadRequest(f"Target value for {nutrient.name} must be positive.")
1718                    insert_stmt = objective_nutrients.insert().values(
1719                        objective_id=objective.id,
1720                        nutrient_id=nutrient_id,
1721                        target_value=target_value
1722                    )
1723                    db.session.execute(insert_stmt)
1724                except ValueError:
1725                    raise BadRequest(f"Target value for {nutrient.name} must be a valid number.")
1726
1727        db.session.commit()
1728        response_data = self._serialize_objective(objective)
1729        json_data = json.dumps(response_data, ensure_ascii=False, indent=4)
1730        return Response(json_data, status=200, mimetype="application/json")
1731
1732    def _delete_objective(self, objective_id):
1733        """Delete an existing objective"""
1734        objective = Objective.query.get_or_404(objective_id)
1735        db.session.delete(objective)
1736        db.session.commit()

1739    def _has_access(self, objective, claims):
1740        """Check if the current user has access to the objective"""
1741        user_role = claims.get("rol")
1742        if user_role == RoleEnum.ADMINISTRATOR.value:
1743            return True
1744        if user_role == RoleEnum.RESELLER.value:
1745            reseller_package = ResellerPackage.query.filter_by(
1746                reseller_id=claims.get("org_id")
1747            ).first()
1748            if not reseller_package:
1749                return False
1750            return any(
1751                org.id == objective.crop.organization.id
1752                for org in reseller_package.organizations
1753            )
1754        return False
1755
1756    def _serialize_objective(self, objective):
1757        """Serialize an Objective object to a dictionary"""
1758        nutrient_targets = db.session.query(objective_nutrients).filter_by(
1759            objective_id=objective.id
1760        ).all()
1761        nutrient_targets_dict = [
1762            {
1763                "nutrient_id": target.nutrient_id,
1764                "target_value": target.target_value,
1765                "nutrient_name": Nutrient.query.get(target.nutrient_id).name,
1766                "nutrient_symbol": Nutrient.query.get(target.nutrient_id).symbol,
1767                "nutrient_unit": Nutrient.query.get(target.nutrient_id).unit,
1768            }
1769            for target in nutrient_targets
1770        ]
1771        return {
1772            "id": objective.id,
1773            "crop_id": objective.crop_id,
1774            "crop_name": objective.crop.name,
1775            "target_value": objective.target_value,
1776            "protein": objective.protein,
1777            "rest": objective.rest,
1778            "created_at": objective.created_at.isoformat(),
1779            "updated_at": objective.updated_at.isoformat(),
1780            "nutrient_targets": nutrient_targets_dict,
1781        }
